title: BROCCOLI APPLE SALAD
directions: 4 cups fresh broccoli florets, (about 2 medium heads)
2 large apples, finely chopped (I used gala apples)
½ cup low fat greek yogurt
ingredients: Broccoli, pecans, cranberries, carrots and apples come together to make an amazing salad with delicious flavors and textures. The creamy dressing on top makes this salad absolutely incredible!
4 cups fresh broccoli florets, (about 2 medium heads)
2 large apples, finely chopped (I used gala apples)
½ cup low fat greek yogurt
